review.findings: ERR-001 fix: atomic temp+rename in hm-send.js fallback, stable-size guard in watcher.js, regression test. Analyst verified root cause match (non-atomic write + eager watcher race). Reviewer approved code quality: collision-proof temp naming, Windows-safe rename handling, bounded retries (3x50ms), proper timer cleanup, chokidar ignores .tmp files. 33 tests passing.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
